krissmincey: This is the most accurate definition of Black Ive heard to date. Thank you for this language💆🏾‍♀️
mid_nite_rogue: Hi @ihartericka I'm T (holding out for the day pronouns become completely irrelevant). Seeing you and Ebony two powerful and uplifting and unabashedly honest Black Queer folx on my screen everyday gives me just enough motivation to keep plugging along in life and love. Fun fact: I'm from eastern Suffolk Long Island and grew up a Jehovah's Witness. I didn't truly come out until I was 30 and left. Now I'mma shush and go find your podcast and get my life.
